pullRequest.title: Improve static code analysis
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removed static spotbugs rule to ignore all issues with rank >= 16
Instead allowing issues of all ranks, but ignoring some select issues for which it is not clear if it is a real issue in the code, or if spotbugs is giving false positives.
Fixed spotbugs configuration files which were linked to non-existent spotbugs include/exclude files
Added configuration file for codebeat

nodes.bodyText: Do these Versions comply with the version used in our Eclipse IDE?
// Please add a comment why the instanceof check is not needed anymore
Is it really that simple now? Why did we have so much more complicated before?
Is the upfront cast in line 58 and 59 already ensuring that there is no null pointer sneaking into the IF scope?
The super user should always be deactivated after each test. Why is it removed here?
Should still be here to set the super user to false, after a test case has been executed.

Renamed AtomicException to AtomicExceptionReference - (Task #432)

- Recommended by spotbugs as to prevent confusion with actual Exceptions
(e.g. classes that subcass the Exception class).

nodes.bodyText: Let's maybe just leave it as a CategoryAssignment which is already an IInstance and throw away casting?
Shall we move checkstyle on directly after the magic numbers?

This will be conflicting with changes in #550
I suggest we merge that one first
Shouldn't it be s%n like in other places?

likely to be ignored. Lowered them.
